name: Kitchen Calculator CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ project1-tests ]
    paths:
      - 'Kitchen Calculator/**'
  pull_request:
    branches: [ project1-tests ]
    paths:
      - 'Kitchen Calculator/**'

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: windows-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Configure CMake
        run: |
          cd "Kitchen Calculator"
          cmake -S . -B build -G "Visual Studio 17 2022" -A x64

      - name: Build Kitchen Calculator
        run: |
          cmake --build "Kitchen Calculator/build" --config Release

      - name: Run Tests
        run: |
          cd "Kitchen Calculator/build"
          ctest -C Release --output-on-failure
